alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:53PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wasatch and north central Utah Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 352 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wasatch Mountain State Park, or 7 miles southwest of Heber City, moving west/southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heber City, Heber, Daniel, Wasatch Mountain State Park, Midway, Charleston, Wallsburg, Deer Creek State Park and Sundance. This includes US Route 40 between mile markers 11 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
